job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtAbout the Role  ltstronggtltpgtltpgtLogic2020 is seeking a Machine Learning Engineerampnbspwho will be part of a team that leads the way in bringing artificial intelligence and machine learning into the very processes and systems that impact how customers are served This is an exciting opportunity to make an impact with by leveraging AI and ML techniques to create production level systems through application of machine learning modelsampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtCore Responsibilities  ltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtWork with data scientists to take proofofconcept models and implement them in production systemsltligtltligtDesign systems that work at scale and successfully handle customer loadltligtltligtDevelop software to help extract data and create features around itltligtltligtContribute to the team with software best practicesthis is especially important given the fast pace nature of the workltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtampnbspltstronggtAbout You  ltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtYoure passionate about finding solutions to deep technical problemsltligtltligtYou have knowledge of professional enterprise software development and practices including software lifecycle best coding practices version control architecture testing and deploymentltligtltligtYou have experience in prototyping machine learning models on data from multiple data sources with many distinct attributesltligtltligtYou have experience in taking proofofconcept machine learning models and figuring out how to deploy them into productionltligtltligtYou have familiarity with popular machine learning libraries and frameworks Tensorflow Keras etcltligtltligtYou are proficient in Python and comfortable with objectoriented and programming languages particularly JavaltligtltligtAdditional exposure to Kubernetes Sagemaker or other relevant technologies is desiredampnbspampnbspltligtltligtShould have worked in data modeling applying machine learning algorithms based on the business problemltligtltligtMasters degreePhD in computer science or related fieldltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtampnbspltstronggtAbout Logic2020  ltstronggtltpgtltpgtLogic2020 is one of Seattles fastestgrowing consulting firms We hire remarkable people to create simple efficient solutions for complex problemsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAlthough we make it look like magic our success is due to our approach methodical and structured and the people we hire smart motivated and teamoriented Together these enable us to consistently exceed client expectationsand our reputation is growingltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtFor the past five years weve placed in the top ten of Seattle Business magazines Best Companies to Work For From engaged leadership and wideranging benefits to career mentorship and diverse internal opportunities we pride ourselves on being one of the best companies to work with and work forltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe hire people that are selfmotivated comfortable conceiving strategies on the fly and enjoy working individually and as part of a team Our work is highenergy and demanding but new hires will quickly feel at home among colleagues as friendly and focused as they are We bring our best to every opportunity driving change in industries across the West Coast Join us and you can tooltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe build an environment where we really operate as one team building up each others careers and capabilities  Adam Cornille Director Advanced Analyticsampnbspltpgtltpgtltpgt
